Reviews.Title: 6 Hours on Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Jeanette S Cates, PhD
Reviews.Content: I have had several Dell computers in the past, so I expected this one to be as good as the others. I was wrong.The networking card would not connect to my wireless network. Searching online I found out this was a common issue for new Dells out of the box. I followed the advice of several sites, downloading software (on the computer in the office down the hall) and installing it on this one. No luck.I called Tech Support. The first woman was confused that she could not connect to my computer to diagnose the problem. I explained that WAS the problem. Two hours later she decided to transfer me to the networking group - and hung up.I called back. This woman assured me that there was no need for the networking group. She could handle it. She told me it was my router, my service provider, and just about anything else she could think of, none of which worked. Two hours later she said her shift was ending and she set an appointment to call me back the next day.She did not call. After waiting another two hours, I called Tech Support for the third time. This man assured me that he could fix the two issues - it would not connect with the wireless networking and the Dell 2405FPW external monitor I had would not show the proper resolution. By the end of his two hours, he had told me it was MY fault for buying the wrong computer that wouldn't work with the Dell monitor. (In spite of the online literature that told me Dell has never updated their drivers for that monitor.) And that he would be glad to have me send in the computer, wait a week, and see if they could fix it.I requested a refund. Then I had to jump through the hoops with two different supervisors reiterating that it was MY fault for ordering a computer without a separate graphics card. And that they would be happy to see if they could fix the networking card if only I would spend a week without my computer.Not only was I disappointed that I spent so much time trying to work out this issue, but I was also insulted that they put the blame on me Whatever happened to the idea that the customer is always right? I will never buy another Dell - nor will most of my friends, after seeing what I went through.Check my other reviews to see which computer I bought instead - and love!

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop for a Good Price
Reviews.Author: TecGeek
Reviews.Content: Got this laptop for $600 including taxes for Black Friday. This is a pretty good laptop with good configuration. The cover and the mouse are finger print sensitive. The mouse does not work and gets stuck some times and the processor is good for the price.UPDATE 03/08/2014I just installed Windows 8.1 Update 1 and the laptop starts up much faster and the response time to programs has also improved. So, if your PC is slow when you installed Windows 8.1, install Update 1 and test it out yourself.Here is the link for downloading Windows 8.1 Update 1:64-Bit OS: [...]After you unzip the files, you will have 6 different updates and install them in the following order:KB2919442KB2939087KB2932046KB2919355KB2938439KB2937592

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron Laptop
Reviews.Author: Luis Lopez
Reviews.Content: Unit works fine, not the best of it but performance is according to what I paid for. Mouse pad left button extremely loud compared to other laptops. The computers case gets greasy very easily do to its texture like finish.

Reviews.Title: Very nice unit for price
Reviews.Author: G. Burrescia
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a new simple replacement for my 6 year old 17" HP, which came with XP and I had installed 7 on. This fairly thin, light and clean Dell was an excellent choice and fit my needs perfectly. Still getting used to Windows 8.1 as I have not used it prior to this, but as far as the laptop itself goes I feel like I've had it for years.

Reviews.Title: Crashed after three months
Reviews.Author: Brian T. Roaden
Reviews.Content: After installing Windows 8.1, the computers hard drive crashed and would not reboot. Dell is going to replace the hard drive or the whole thing for me, but I lost some of my work. It will take 7-10 business days to receive my replacement laptop. I like the Toshiba that I have had for years better than the Dell.

Reviews.Title: Its a nice laptop
Reviews.Author: Bipin
Reviews.Content: This laptop is recommended as its light weight & performs really well. Its sleek and super fast. This is really a great laptop for general use or to do some real work.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: German Sanchez
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent laptop, i recommend to all user, it has good design and also it has a good price.

Reviews.Title: No VGA or Bluetooth
Reviews.Author: Christian De Freitas
Reviews.Content: First of all this is an excellent-value laptop, very snappy, and light.If you're like me, and have an extra monitor lying around and want the versatility of dual screen, you wouldn't be able to use it immediately since it has no VGA or DVI port, only HDMI. That problem is easily solvable with a cheap dongle from AmazonBasics, doesn't have Bluetooth either, also solvable :)get these accesories and convert this laptop to an ideal powerhorse.HDMI to DVI adapter http://amzn.to/QxXKjbHDMI to VGA adapter http://amzn.to/RLzBX6HDMI to VGA monitor cable http://amzn.to/1rkB8Qh (compatible with 1080p)Mini Bluetoth adapter http://amzn.to/1mDWclcObviously the star i removed was the lack of the VGA/DVI port, that's something for me very necessary to hook up to a projector when giving speeches, working with dual pane display, etcI repeat once you get the adapter this comes out to be an excellent laptop, great buyBTW: If you want the same laptop but in a 17 inch display, here it is http://amzn.to/1nGx76H

Reviews.Title: till now, it has fullfilled my expectations
Reviews.Author: Anderson L.
Reviews.Content: The portatil has a wonderful functioning, it runs applications very nice. Just a little detail I don't like, mousepad buttons clic so loud (not quite). for all of it, so nice. Even delivery was as I expected.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: etta
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, easy to use. Sturdy, fast, comfortable. Great battery life. Perfect size. Windows 8 took a little research, but the tutorials provided were excellent. Nice job!!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: David Zhunio
Reviews.Content: I like, everything is present excellent product, great windows 8.1!, video or drawing programs run well so far! thanks ...

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Sebas Solano
Reviews.Content: I just love this computer. It's a great deal, considering the core (which is awesome) and the others especifications. This laptop is working more than perfect. So if you're looking for the right personal computer, this is the one.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: Steven W. Fidler
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my step daughter for graduation, I got it started up and went through all the required stuff so she can just get going on it. Works Great and looks like it will do well
